Text.Page:
{@Creature:47#4003#Argonomorph gulas} have taken over a camp north of here. I'd like to know why, but I have no desire to be killed and eaten. No one here does.

Will you investigate and possibly drive them back a bit?

This soil was on their shoes? Dirt is common enough, but the seeds embedded in it are not. They came from {@Rgn:45001$$Thrallhold}.

Go to Pathfinder Post immediately and report this to Borskan. The argonomorph gulas are on the move.
Have you driven the gulas back?

So the gulas came here from Thrallhold. Wasn't expecting that.

I wonder whether you'd help me investigate further.
